section.section: The PACE board shall establish fair, equitable, objective, nondiscriminatory procedures for determining easement purchase priorities.
The board shall promulgate administrative regulations establishing policies and procedures for determining easement purchase priorities and for purchasing easements.
The program criteria shall be designed to ensure that land is selected for easement purchase because it will make a significant contribution to agricultural production.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 390, sec. 23, effective July 15, 1994.
